title: League failing and BSOD
body: Whenever I start league and go to get in a game on my new laptop I get a BSOD and the error code is **igdkmd64.sys** I don't know what I can do to fix this I just updated my drivers on my gtx 1070 and nothing happened. I have windows 10. When I play Portal 2 on my computer it works fine. It just seems to be League that this happens on. Any help would be appreciated greatly.

replies.body:
I did a little research on that error, and it's looking like this is caused by some graphical hardware errors or possibly improperly installed drivers. Check the steps outlined in the guide below, and let me know if it doesn't help. 

https://www.drivereasy.com/knowledge/igdkmd64-sys-video-tdr-failure-bsod-error-windows-10/
